titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1628) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2017.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1628) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2017.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-58, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 26.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 228.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 186 (Roll no. 191).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 194 (Roll no. 192).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1628) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2017.
